title: HELP . Titling Typeface Identification . HELP
content:
… … … . .  
Blessings of the Masses  
+  
Blessings of the State  
… … … . .

My sincerest regards to all here in these typophile forums,

I come in need of your type knowledge + type wisdom + type understanding .

The typeface in question appears to be a titling face which i thought was CALIFORNIAN .

but alas , it is not .

can anyone lend definitive identification and possibly background information of this typeface .

.

PEACE BE WITH YOU

aerosyn-lex m.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [type.gif](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=type_0.gif) | 1.62 KB |
author: Aerosyn-Lex Mes...

comments.content: It appears to be [Serlio](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110013945/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/serlio/lh/testdrive.html?s=WAR&p=72), spaced extremely tight.
